channel.title: Romeo and Juliet - Short Essay
channel.description:
Hi Everyone - Long time no uhh post. :)
Anyway, I have a lot of work to do this weekend, and I just wondered if you guys could help me lift the burden of how much work I have to do.
It would be really helpful if someone could do this small essay for me.
[b]Aim[/b]:Describe the Character of Romeo and explain how and why he changes during the text. Use a minimum of 250 words!
[b]Introduction[/b]: Give the name of the text and author. Give the name of the character and state the focus of the essay.
[b]Main Body[/b]: This section of the essay is diveded into paragraphs and you should include referene to the text and suitable quotations. (Each bullet point idicates a different paragraph)
[b]Aspects to consider[/b]:
[ul][li]What benvolio says about Romeo at the beginning about his behaviour. What romeo says to benvolio to explain his behaviour. The language Romeo uses.[/li] [li]Describe the meeting between Romeo and Juliet at the Capulet Ball. What imagery does Romeo use to describe Juliet and how is this different from how benvolio described him in the first scene? What does this tell you about him?[/li] [li]Decribe the meeting tbetween romeo and juliet after the Ball on her balcony. Discuss the imagery and what they agree to do.[/li][/ul]
[b]Conclusion[/b]: Sum up the points in the main body of your essay, linking back to the question.
__________
As I said, this is not abosolutely neccessary, but it would relieve the amount of homework I have to do!
Here is the full script of romeo and juliet:
http://www.william-shakespeare.info/script-text-romeo-and-juliet.htm
